definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: desirableness, preciousness—Pl. abs. [[חֲמוּדוֹת]] Da 9:23; [[חֲמוּדׂת]] Ezr 8:37; [[חֲמֻדוֹת]] 2Ch 20:25 + 4 t.; [[חֲמֻדׂת]] Ge 27:15; cstr. [[חֲמֻדוֹת]] Da 11:43; —desirable, choice things i.e. garments Ge 27:15 (‖[[בגדים]]); cf. Da 11:38 (‖[[אבן]] [[יקרה]]), Da 11:43 ([[חֲמֻדוֹת מִחְרַיִם]]); = precious things Ezr 8:27 (as gold); ´[[כלי ח]] 2Ch 20:25; ´[[לֶחֶם ח]] De 10:3; of man only ´[[אִישׁ־ח]] Da 10:11, Da 10:19, and, without [[אישׁ]], [[אָ֫תָּה]] ´[[ח]] Da 9:23 thou art a precious treasure (on construction v. Dr:§ 189, 2; v. Bev and cf. neg. [[חמד]] Is 53:2).
